item.title: E.T. phone home
item.description: November 4th was my dadâ€™s birthday so I called home to be present being far away. Truth is while Iâ€™m traveling I hardly ever call home, I donâ€™t like it, too much me- focus, but I try to make exceptions during special occasion like this one. Half my family is at the country house, the other is getting there the next day for the big asado. I havenâ€™t even send him a text message as we were on our technology- free day off, out all day in Tulum; so I decided to do a â€˜surpriseâ€™ WhatsApp video call.
